```{r}

disturbances <- read_csv("data_raw/disturbances.csv") 


```

```{r}

ggplot(disturbances, aes(x = location, y = dist_per_m)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = c("#386641", "orange4")) +
   scale_x_discrete(labels = c(
    "SCI" = "Santa Cruz Island",
    "Sedgwick" = "Sedgwick"
  )) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Disturbances per meter",
    fill = "Location") +
    theme_classic(base_size = 18)+
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
     axis.text.x  = element_text(face = "bold", 
                                 size = 18,
                                 vjust = -3),
                                 axis.title.y = element_text(face = "bold",
                                size = 18), 
    plot.margin = margin(b = 20)
  )



```
